channel.title: PwnXile | 100% uptime | Hundreads of players daily |Over 300k players registered
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.pwnxile.com"][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/23iw3dv.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.pwnxile.com"][img]http://imgtool.in/img/toplistbanner4.gif[/img][/URL]
[img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/5559/9fb2d1012e6748fb8b91d39.png[/img]
[B]Client mirrors:[/B]
[URL=http://"http://5.199.164.237/"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.pwnxile.com/client.jar"]Downloadable client[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://www.pwnxile.com"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://pwnxile.com/index.php?page=vote"]Vote for Rewards[/URL]
[img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/6436/025ecc202c8e4b6d8ea6ec9.png[/img]
[B]100% Uptime 400+ Players Online Multiple Connected Worlds Works on Windows, Linux and Mac! Dual Xeon X5650. 24 Cores 12GB of RAM. (24GB Burst) DDoS Protected[/B]
[B]Welcome to PwnXile, the RuneScape private server brought to you by Robbie and Ed. We have hundreds online, playable 24.7 and hundreds of thousands of accounts.
Here at PwnXile we take a different approach than other generic servers you come across. We work endlessly to bring you a dedicated, high performance environment so you can play our enjoyable and content-filled server emulator.
We invest hundreds of dollars into our secure and stable server architecture to ensure dedicated uptime and a fast connection, all protected behind state of the art firewall mechanisms. Security and stability are very important to us, that's why we make sure we are the best around at offering this.
In regard to content, we have a great many minigames to play, such as Castle Wars, Fight Pits and Pest Control, as well as a few others. Each minigame is always actively being played with numerous rewards and incentives available to enhance your gaming experience.
We also have some of the most enjoyable Pking around, our Wilderness zones are always packed with pkers. Why not join them? [/B]
[img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/9996/fd604fc6e768466cab43ded.png[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/9301/19a41613a9184db9a5d0fbb.png[/img] [img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/8467/65b7f1a8e83748308f48e6f.png[/img] [img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/7155/406e54c555174757b815b6d.png[/img] [img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/8333/98c1042e60c342729359402.png[/img] [img]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/1857/64d14e25e1af49589ceaf73.png[/img] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-FcL7guJhkQ
[URL=http://"http://5.199.164.237/"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.pwnxile.com/client.jar"]Downloadable client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.pwnxile.com"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://pwnxile.com/index.php?page=vote"]Vote for Rewards[/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: PwnXile | 100% uptime | Hundreads of players daily |Over 300k players registered
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“ferocious 728, post:9, topic:463029”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=566303.msg4118233#msg4118233 date=1349351372]

[quote author=ferocious 728 link=topic=566303.msg4118232#msg4118232 date=1349351267]

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=566303.msg4118231#msg4118231 date=1349351053]

There were resets only because Owners had to fix the duping. It’s all fixed now.

Vote everyday for up to 25M and 50 pxp

If voting returns 25m think how horrible the economy is you buffoon.
[/quote]It depends on yopur total level, If you’re maxed you get 25m, if you just vote with no skills you get like 200k.

So they’re not balancing the economy? Think if someone who’s up and coming votes every day and gets 1m, then a maxed user votes every day and gets 25m after 10 days the not as advanced user will have 25m and the maxed user will have 250m? Lol…

Take it on a 30 day month for example, if the user who gets 1m votes every day and gets 30m, the maxed user will have three quarters of a billion.
[/quote]Well that’s why it will inspire people to skill. Our players aren’t complaining.

An ex player just complained about economy resets. Economy resets are performed due to an unbalanced economy and if they think that’s going to balance it out then they’re down right retarded.
[/quote]There was a reset because of duping. Learn to read.
Everything is fixed atm. And if you do nothing but hate then leave.[/quote]

I owned a server around the time pwnxile first came out and I had over 600 online within 4 months. They’ve only just reached that, if they focused on their economy they could have a much better server.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ferocious_728 ferocious 728
item.description:
@ferocious_728 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:8, topic:463029”][quote author=ferocious 728 link=topic=566303.msg4118232#msg4118232 date=1349351267]

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=566303.msg4118231#msg4118231 date=1349351053]

There were resets only because Owners had to fix the duping. It’s all fixed now.

Vote everyday for up to 25M and 50 pxp

If voting returns 25m think how horrible the economy is you buffoon.
[/quote]It depends on yopur total level, If you’re maxed you get 25m, if you just vote with no skills you get like 200k.

So they’re not balancing the economy? Think if someone who’s up and coming votes every day and gets 1m, then a maxed user votes every day and gets 25m after 10 days the not as advanced user will have 25m and the maxed user will have 250m? Lol…

Take it on a 30 day month for example, if the user who gets 1m votes every day and gets 30m, the maxed user will have three quarters of a billion.
[/quote]Well that’s why it will inspire people to skill. Our players aren’t complaining.

An ex player just complained about economy resets. Economy resets are performed due to an unbalanced economy and if they think that’s going to balance it out then they’re down right retarded.[/quote]There was a reset because of duping. Learn to read.
Everything is fixed atm. And if you do nothing but hate then leave.

Read full topic
